title: on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Bailte Seirbhíse
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Bailte Seirbhíse 

Gaeltachta a Ainmniú), (Uimh. 3) 2022 a ghairm den Ordú seo.

title: on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted
heading: 2. Ainmnítear gach baile a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Bhaile Seirbhíse
text_raw:
2. Ainmnítear gach baile a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Bhaile Seirbhíse 

Gaeltachta críocha alt 9(1) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 9 Nollaig, 2022, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [637] 3 

SCEIDEAL 

Baile Seirbhíse Gaeltachta: Caisleán an Bharraigh, Co. Mhaigh Eo 

(1) An baile seo a leanas: Caisleán an Bharraigh 

Baile Seirbhíse Gaeltachta: Dún Garbhán, Co. Phort Láirge 

(1) An baile seo a leanas: Dún Garbhán 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh,, 
 7 Nollaig 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, 

Spóirt agus Meán 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [637] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 637 of 2022 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT SERVICE 
TOWNS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [637] 5 

S.I. No. 637 of 2022 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT SERVICE 
TOWNS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2022 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred 
on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted 
by the Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department 
and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial 
Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
text_norm: 2 ainmnitear gach baile shonraitear sa sceideal mar bhaile seirbhise gaeltachta criocha alt 9(1) acht na gaeltachta 2012 (uimh 34 de 2012) foilsiodh fogra san iris oifigiuil 9 nollaig 2022 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo 637 3 sceideal baile seirbhise gaeltachta caislean bharraigh co mhaigh eo (1) baile seo leanas caislean bharraigh baile seirbhise gaeltachta dun garbhan co phort lairge (1) baile seo leanas dun garbhan arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 7 nollaig 2022 jack chamber aire stait ag roinn turasoireachta cultuir ealaion gaeltachta spoirt agus mean 4 637 official translation tiontu oifigiuil statutory instrument s.i no 637 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht service towns) (no 3) order 2022 637 5 s.i no 637 2022 gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht service towns) (no 3) order 2022 jack chamber minister state department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium exercise power conferred section 9(1) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) (as adapted culture heritage gaeltacht (alteration name department title minister) order 2020 (s.i no 403 2020)) tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020 (s.i no 547 2020) hereby order follows

title: on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Service Towns) (No. 3) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht service towns) (no 3) order 2022

title: on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted
heading: 2. Each town specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. Each town specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Service Town for the purposes of section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 
34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [637]
text_norm: 2 town specified schedule designated gaeltacht service town purpose section 9(1) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th december 2022 6 637

title: on me by section 9(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted
heading: Gaeltacht Service Town: Castlebar, Co. Mayo
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Gaeltacht Service Town: Castlebar, Co. Mayo 

(1) The following town: Castlebar 

Gaeltacht Service Town: Dungarvan, Co. Waterford 

(1) The following town: Dungarvan 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 7 December 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [637] 7
